I hope you're doing well.

 

I wanted to update you on the dataset. It now contains multiple versions, with each version having its own "Cut-Off Date." This will help in the interpretation of the data by clearly marking the time frame of each version.

 

Please let me know if you need any further clarification or have any other questions.

 

Best regards,

 

Saber Khalfallah

Hello Scott,

 

Thank you for reaching out.

 

Yes, we do support API access.

Authentication is handled using the login credentials we provided, which will generate an access token. This token can then be used to make authorized requests to our API.

 

For your convenience, I’ve attached a PDF containing a Python script that demonstrates how to authenticate and download a dataset via the API. This should help you get started quickly.

 

Let me know how it works out for you, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions or run into any issues,I’m happy to help.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah
